basics.name: Samuel Oyegbemi
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Passionate software engineer with over 8 years of technical experience in building quality and reliable software solutions. Specialized in microservices architecture, cloud infrastructure (AWS), and DevOps practices. Have the privilege of leading technical teams, ensuring best practices and effective collaboration. Currently looking out for opportunities to employ my skills in crafting software to meet business needs.

projects.name: Munchmate
projects.description: Full-stack food delivery platform connecting restaurants with customers across Nigerian cities
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive food delivery ecosystem featuring customer mobile apps, restaurant management dashboard, and driver tracking system. Built with microservices architecture on AWS, handling real-time order tracking, payment processing, and logistics optimization. Scaled to serve 1,000+ active users with 99.9% uptime.
highlights: Microservices architecture with Node.js, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL
Real-time order tracking using WebSocket and GPS integration
Payment gateway integration with Paystack and Flutterwave
AWS infrastructure with ECS, RDS, ElastiCache, and CloudFront
Terraform-managed infrastructure with CI/CD using GitHub Actions
Flutter mobile apps for iOS and Android with 4.8+ star rating

projects.name: Terraform AWS GitHub Runner
projects.description: Production-ready Terraform module for deploying self-hosted GitHub Actions runners on AWS
projects.longDescription: Enterprise-grade Infrastructure-as-Code solution that automates deployment of self-hosted GitHub Actions runners on AWS. Features auto-scaling based on workflow queue depth, spot instance support for 70% cost savings, and comprehensive security controls. Used in production environments for cost-effective CI/CD at scale.
highlights: Auto-scaling infrastructure that scales to zero when idle
70% cost reduction through AWS spot instances
VPC networking with private subnet isolation
IAM role-based security with least privilege access
Support for both Linux (x64/arm64) and Windows runners

projects.name: CloudFront Authentication
projects.description: Lambda@Edge authentication layer for AWS CloudFront with OAuth2 and SAML support
projects.longDescription: Serverless authentication solution that runs at the edge using AWS Lambda@Edge. Protects CloudFront distributions with enterprise SSO providers (Okta, Azure AD, Google) using OAuth2 and SAML protocols. Zero-latency authentication with JWT validation at CloudFront edge locations worldwide.
highlights: Edge-based authentication for global low-latency
OAuth2, SAML, and OpenID Connect protocol support
Integration with enterprise SSO (Okta, Azure AD, Auth0)
JWT token validation and refresh at the edge
Session management with encrypted cookies

projects.name: @wbc-nodejs/core
projects.description: Production-ready NPM package providing essential utilities for Node.js backend applications
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive Node.js library implementing common patterns and utilities for enterprise backend applications. Provides standardized error handling, configuration management, validation patterns, and API response formatting. Published on NPM with semantic versioning and used across multiple production applications.
highlights: Published NPM package with automated releases
Standardized error handling with 6 custom error types
Environment-based configuration with validation
20+ utility functions for common backend tasks
Email, phone, URL, password validation patterns
JWT token management and CORS configuration

projects.name: Star Wars Explorer
projects.description: Interactive Vue.js web application for exploring Star Wars universe data with Firebase backend
projects.longDescription: Full-stack single-page application built with Vue.js that provides an immersive experience for exploring Star Wars characters, planets, and starships. Features real-time data synchronization with Firebase, responsive design, and smooth animations. Demonstrates proficiency in modern frontend frameworks and Firebase ecosystem.
highlights: Built with Vue.js 3 Composition API and TypeScript
Real-time data synchronization using Firebase Realtime Database
Firebase Authentication with Google and GitHub providers
Responsive UI with Vuetify component library
SWAPI integration for comprehensive Star Wars data

projects.name: MVM Hyper
projects.description: A play to earn gaming platform where individuals can play practice games for fun or play p2p for reward
highlights: The API is designed as microservices, developed using Node.js, MySQL and MongoDB
The Mobile app is developed with Flutter

projects.name: SMEShop
projects.description: A learning management system and consultancy platform for Small and Medium scale Enterprise
highlights: Platform is made up of four services, developed using Node.js, React.js, and PostgreSQL

projects.name: BSchoolAfrica
projects.description: Learning management system customized from SMEShop
highlights: Customized platform for business education in Africa

achievements.title: Led Team to 99.9% Uptime
achievements.description: Architected and maintained microservices infrastructure achieving 99.9% uptime for Munchmate platform serving 1,000+ daily users
